Last reply to Daveb (I promise):  And what about those who constantly tells other bloggers what to say and what not to say?
Note for Dan: I really believe this is a legitimate question that shouldn’t be removed…
author: Yannick Clément

title: Attacking someone’s character or personal traits
post: Thank you Dan.  Now, can we start again exchanging opinions and debating ideas about the Shroud?  I promise to do my best to cool myself before pushing the “Post comment” button.  And it will be alot easier for me if no one tells me what to say and what not to say…  As I always say:  If you don’t like my opinion or comment, pass-it by.  This is as simple as that.
author: Yannick Clément
